attributes.comment:
I would request that the fee increase for immigration and petitions to
adopt be reconsidered and denied. I am logged in to adopt an infant in China.
We have already gone through the process of one petition. This pettiion for an
advanced placemnet for an orphan will expire in a month. The referral dates
have increased dramatically since we started, 8 months now to 17 months. This
means we will have to go through the petition process again. This affects
thousands of families in the U.S. Do we need to increase fees for couples that
only want to become parents. Please consider the above and do not increase the
fees

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Curt Coplien
